com.berbils.game.Entities.EntityTypes

Class CircleGameEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.berbils.game.Entities.EntityTypes.Entity
      • com.berbils.game.Entities.EntityTypes.CircleGameEntity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Projectiles, Tower

    public class CircleGameEntity
extends Entity
    Creates a Box2D circular body and fixture definition

    Also has the ability to auto generate sprites and the body and fixture

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.berbils.game.Entities.EntityTypes.Entity

        catBits, entityBody, entityBodyDefinition, entityFixture, entityFixtureDefinition, entityShape, entitySprite, isStatic, maskBits, position, screen, sizeDims, spriteHandler, spriteLayer, userData, world

      Constructs a box2D Body definition and fixture

      Constructs a box2D Body, fixture and potentially a sprite (if texture not null) with the given variables

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void defineBox2DEntity()
      Creates a box shape, body, fixture and sprite according to already defined parameters from within entity

    • Constructor Detail

      • CircleGameEntity

        public CircleGameEntity(PlayScreen screen,
                        float diam,
                        java.lang.String textureFilePath,
                        boolean isStatic,
                        int spriteLayer)
        Constructs a box2D Body definition and fixture
        Parameters:
        screen - The screen containing the world where the Box2D object will be created
        diam - The diameter of the circle body in meters to be created
        textureFilePath - The file path to the texture for the sprite, NOTE - If this is null a sprite will not be created
        isStatic - Used to set the Box2D body type to either Static ( true) or Dynamic (false)
        spriteLayer - The layer the sprite will be drawn on, 0 being the bottom layer

      • CircleGameEntity

        public CircleGameEntity(PlayScreen screen,
                        float diam,
                        com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 pos,
                        java.lang.String textureFilePath,
                        boolean isStatic,
                        short catBits,
                        short maskBits,
                        int spriteLayer)
        Constructs a box2D Body, fixture and potentially a sprite (if texture not null) with the given variables
        Parameters:
        screen - The screen containing the world where the Box2D object will be created
        diam - The diameter of the circle body in meters to be created
        pos - The position in meters that the body, fixture and sprite will be created at where the origin is the centre of the body
        textureFilePath - The file path to the texture for the sprite, NOTE - If this is null a sprite will not be created
        isStatic - Used to set the Box2D body type to either Static ( true) or Dynamic (false)
        catBits - The category bits used for Box2D collision filtering
        maskBits - The mask bits used for Box2D collision filtering
        spriteLayer - The layer the sprite will be drawn on, 0 being the bottom layer

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getSizeDims()
